column3: Did not have breakfast at location.  My room wasperfect for my stay.  Lady at front desk was very helpful with checkin and helping me with booking a train for next day.  That was so much appreciated.
Location was excellent, staff were nice. Room was modern and very clean.
column4: The room was dark, no drawers to put small clothes.

column3: Location was perfect and staff were friendly
column4: There was no refrigerator in the room and also no slippers and a minor sewage smell for a few hours

column3: Location is perfect, just minutes from the square. Beautiful views and friendly staff
Excellent location and staff very friendly and helpful.
The room was quite good, the location of the  hotel was also good.  So we quite enjoyed our time there.
column4: Towels and bed sheets never changed, I guess it's the only thing.

column3: Location fantastic, staff good, fine bed and bathroom.
column4: No wardrobe in room, just a frame with a couple of clothes hangers. Also a convoluted lighting system, got the hang of it after a couple of days!!
